metadata.title: CVE-2024-35926 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: iaa - Fix async_disable descriptor leakThe disable_async paths of iaa_compress/decompress() don't free idxddescriptors in the async_disable case. Currently this only happens inthe testcases where req->dst is set to null. Add a test to free themin those paths.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
